text: karaoke fans rejected the traditional sentiments of auld lang syne this new year and saw in 2013 gangnam style , according to a new poll . the k-pop rapper psy 's worldwide hit single topped a chart to find the most sung song in the uk on new year 's eve . it accounted for almost a quarter -lrb- 23 per cent -rrb- of the 100,000 songs sung on monday on karaoke firm lucky voice 's online service . scroll down for video . hey sexy lady ! : south korean pop sensation psy beat auld lang syne as the karaoke favourite on new year 's eve . it pushed the traditional favourite , based on a poem by scottish poet robert burns , off the top spot for the first time since 2005 . other popular choices included adele 's someone like you and call me maybe by carly rae jepsen . the firm 's boss nick thistleton said : ` auld lang syne has always , without fail , been the people 's choice to celebrate the start of the new year . top tunes : someone like you by adele -lrb- left -rrb- and call me maybe by carly rae jepsen were also popular new year songs . burns night : deposed karaoke favourite auld langs syne is based on a poem by robert burns . ` since we started recording the uk karaoke charts , no song has come close to taking the number one spot . ` yet since we added gangnam style to our catalogue of over 8,000 songs at the end of last year we have seen it quickly become an established karaoke favourite . ` it would have been great to be a fly on the wall at the thousands of house parties across the uk to see so many people getting involved - singing and dancing along around their laptops . ' 1 . gangnam style , psy -lrb- 23 % -rrb- 2 . auld lang syne , robert burns -lrb- 4.5 % -rrb- 3 . someone like you , adele -lrb- 4.3 % -rrb- 4 . call me maybe , carly rae jepsen -lrb- 3.7 % -rrb- 5 . we are never ever getting back together , taylor swift -lrb- 3.5 % -rrb- 6 . what makes you beautiful , one direction -lrb- 3 % -rrb- 7 . last christmas , wham -lrb- 2.6 % -rrb- 8 . candy , robbie williams -lrb- 2.3 % -rrb- 9 . sweet caroline , neil diamond -lrb- 2 % -rrb- 10 . troublemaker , olly murs -lrb- 1.5 % -rrb- .
summary: online karaoke firm reveals korean rapper 's hit was top ny tune .   beat perennial favourite auld lang syne to top spot .   other singalong favourites include adele and carly rae jepsen .
